Question: Ningbo Shunshuai Electrical Appliance Co.,Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Ningbo Shunshuai Electrical Appliance Co.,Ltd.

CES 2024

- Specializes in small household appliances and beauty & health devices
- Products include hair dryers, hair stylers, foot-spa massagers, and fan-heaters
- All products are GS, CE(EMC, LVD), CB, and CCC certified
- ISO9001:2008 approved enterprise
- Developed advanced technology negative ion hair dryer for healthier and more natural hair care
- Annual sales exceed 2 million units, popular in Europe, North and South America, Russia, and the Middle East
- Offers OEM & ODM orders
- Committed to quality, innovation, and providing safer and more reliable technical support
- Products widely used in relays, switches, contactors, and circuit breakers
- Exported to Europe, America, Asia, and other regions
